CnlType.Name: Input
CnlType.Descr: Channel values are read from a device

CnlType.Name: Input/output
CnlType.Descr: Channel values can be read and written

CnlType.Name: Calculated
CnlType.Descr: Channel values are calculated using a formula

CnlType.Name: Calculated/output
CnlType.Descr: Channel values are calculated and can be written
